quote_first: "A Mr Dutta from King's Cross called and told me you were on your way. He said you wanted to see the arrival of yesterday's
quote_last: It'll take me a few minutes to cue up the footage. Our regular security bloke isn't here today; he's up before Haringey Magistrates' Court for gross indecency outside the headquarters of the Dagenham Girl Pipers."
title: Bryant & May Off the Rails
author: Christopher Fowler
